data.name: HelpBtnTTDesc
data.value: Help and information about this program.

data.name: TTOutDirDesc
data.value: Shows a Dialog that allows you to choose a directory for the output of the movie file.

data.name: TTOutDirTBDesc
data.value: You can enter an output directory path here or select it by the select button.

data.name: TTDecryptFooterDesc
data.value: Only movies with a valid key can be decrypted.

data.name: TTAFDesc
data.value: Decrypts the adaptation field of a TS Packet. Might be needed on some/all? D-Series TVs.

data.name: TTOutDirTBFooterDesc
data.value: Only a valid and existing path will enable you to use the decrypt function.

data.name: TTOpenLocalFooterDesc
data.value: If a keyfile with the same base filename is present, it will also be loaded as part of the movie.

data.name: TTAFFooterDesc
data.value: Sets the default value for this operation. It is settable per file.

data.name: TTDownloadFTPDesc
data.value: Opens a dialog that allows you to select and download movies directly from your TV by FTP

data.name: AnonFTPTTDesc
data.value: Select this, if you do not have to enter a special username and/or password to connect to your FTP Server on your TV.

data.name: TTDecryptDesc
data.value: Decrypts the movies in the list and saves the decrypted streams to the output directory.

data.name: AnonFTPTTFooterDesc
data.value: If deselected, you can enter your FTP login credentials.

data.name: TTKeyRetreivalDesc
data.value: DRMGet: Key retreival over the DRMGet App. DRM must be enabled on the TV and the corresponding movie played to retreive the key. MDF: Key is read from the MDF file accompaniing the movie file. No special prequesites are required.

data.name: TTOpenKeyTitle
data.value: Opens a dialog to load a key file for the selected moviefile.

data.name: TVIPTTFooter
data.value: The IP Address is required if you want to download movie files from your TV.

data.name: TTKeyGroupDesc
data.value: Access to encryption key properties of the selected file.

data.name: TVIPTTDesc
data.value: Select the IP Address of your TV here.

data.name: TTRemoveFileFooterDesc
data.value: If the movie was downloaded from your TV in the current session, you will have the possibility to delete all temporary files.

data.name: TTDownloadFTPFooterDesc
data.value: An output directory must be selected and valid before using this function. A FTP server must be running on your TV. E.g. vsftpd provided with the SamyGO Extensions.

data.name: TTDecryptGroupDesc
data.value: Access to function for decrypting movie files

data.name: TTRefreshIPDesc
data.value: Searches all connected devices in the network and updates the list from which you can choose the TV IP.

data.name: TTRemoveFileDesc
data.value: Removes the selected movies from the decryption list.

data.name: TTTVSettingDesc
data.value: Access to settings regarding your Samsung Television.

data.name: TTOpenLocalDesc
data.value: Opens a movie file from your local disk.

data.name: TTFileGroupDesc
data.value: Access to functions for loading, opening or removing movie files.
